p: The laboratory testing results revealed that 111 of the captured rodents were positive for HV, of which 93 were R. norvegicus, 17 were A. agrarius and 1 was Mus musculus. The mean HV carriage rate among all rodents was 6.17%, and the rates of R. norvegicus, A. agrarius and Mus musculus were 10.24%, 6.32% and 0.27%, respectively ( Table 3). It can be seen that the HV carriage rates in this study were highest for R. norvegicus and A. agrarius among all the rodent species. However, it is worth noting that one HV strain was also isolated from a single Mus musculus in this study.
